They might try to let someone know of their horrid fate by appearing in front of strangers, leading them to their corpse. But some of the time, they just plain try to kill their murderer themselves. Most of the time their murderer is their mother, since women who gave birth outside of marriage back in the day sometimes killed their children to avoid the social stigma.Â
